Title: Establishes the New York State Social Housing Development Authority
Summary: Establishes the New York State social housing development authority as a public benefit corporation to increase the supply of permanently affordable housing in the state through the acquisition of land and renovation or rehabilitation of existing real property, and through the construction of new, permanently affordable housing.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to creating a public benefit corporation for the construction, acquisition, and rehabilitation of permanently affordable housing; and making an appropriation therefor
